summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Story Videos tool for ClipTag AI. All functionality working perfectly - 4-step UI flow, backend API integration, and AI caption generation all successful.

resolved_issues.issue: All story video generation tests passing
Previous authentication persistence issue has been resolved
resolved_issues.selector: Protected routes now accessible after registration/login

passed_tests: Step 1: Story Transcript textarea present and required (data-testid='story-transcript')
Step 2: All 5 story styles clickable (dramatic, mysterious, heartwarming, suspenseful, educational)
Step 3: All 3 story lengths clickable (short, medium, long) with NO seconds shown
Step 4: All 6 background video options visible and selectable (minecraft, roblox, subway, satisfying, cooking, driving)
Generate button disabled when transcript empty
Generate button enabled when transcript has content
POST /api/generate/story-video endpoint works with all required fields
Output panel shows generated captions after successful generation
Backend validation working for empty transcript (400 error)
Backend validation working for invalid style/length/background (400 errors)
AI caption generation working with EMERGENT_LLM_KEY
Complete end-to-end story video generation flow
Protected route access working after authentication
